item.title: Predict breast cancer
item.description: Assignment Predict the class of breast cancer (malignant or ‘bad’ versus benign or ‘good’) from the features of images taken from breast samples. Ten biological attributes of the cancer cell nuclei have been calculated from the images, as described below: Attribute Domain 1. Sample code number id number 2. Clump Thickness 1 - 10 3. Uniformity of Cell Size 1 - 10 4.
